timeline.message: added Note to parse Exception in TableQueryUtils, added more integration tests

timeline.bodyText: Please use the static modifier
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: We can use a ". " in place of the \n
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: Consider using "See https:..."
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: Might want to use "append" rather than "add"
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: This can be static, also check formatting
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: This message can be accessed statically from the class.
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: This can be reverted, no change
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: This can be reverted, no change
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText:
We should add the original ParseException as the cause of the wrapper exception, rather than creating a new instance:
throw new IllegalArgumentException(e.getMessage() + UNQUOTED_KEYWORDS_ERROR_MESSAGE, e);
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: This constant should not be duplicated between this class and the TableExceptionTranslatorImpl, you might want to consider moving the "enriching method" (e.g. appendUnqueoted...) to a common location (For example TableConstants or TableExceptionTranslator interface itself).
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: You can access the constant.
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: Better naming might be: testExtractTableIdFromSqlWithParserException
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: You can simply use assertEquals("Expected error message", exception.getMessage())
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: This check is not necessary since the assertThrows always returns the exception (otherwise it would fail the test)
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: This translatedException is not used, you might need to set this in the job status: asynchJobStatusManager.setJobFailed(status.getJobId(), translatedException);
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: This can be reverted as there is no change.
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: This block of code from 2081 to 2827 is unused in the test.
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: The error message might be something like: "This should have failed with an IllegalArgumentException"
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: The null check is not needed as the assertThrows always returns the exception or fail
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: Try to use an assertEquals rather than contains.
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.message: more specific test name , used assertEquals
switched expected/actual assertions to correct places
